guardian.title: A third of Sierra Leone's Ebola budget unaccounted for, says report
guardian.topComment:
What a surprise!
Whoever would imagine that money would go walkabouts in Africa?

guardian.title: Ukraine ceasefire in tatters as clashes escalate in east
guardian.topComment: The commentary here is getting to be absurd. Ukraine cannot possibly win this war and only fools believe they can. Yes certainly, an all out effort by NATO could bedevil Russia, but how is that going to happen when no politician in the powerhouse EU ...

guardian.title: What is this dog thinking? Scientists now have some fascinating answers
guardian.topComment: I'm pretty sure my dog thinks I'm stupid for going to work 5 days a week instead of staying home to go for walks with him
